content.detailedDescription: Just got home from night shift clock read 5.54am , got out of car stood next to car and looked  up as always  , noticed patchy cloud moving over head rapidly , clear sky was seen so was looking around , then noticed two orange glowing star like spheres flying over from east to south very quickly , they were side by side which is odd so not like satillites which follow behind each other , these were moving  very quickly , lasted for around 6 seconds and vanished into the night sky ... moon was nearly full so very bright , and these two orange spheres really stood out from moon glow .
content.summary: Got out of car just got home fron work, stood and looked straight up , noticed two orange lights side by side flying quickly over heads towards south for about 6 sec then  vanished .

content.detailedDescription:
My older brother and i were riding our bicycles from our house to my aunt and uncle's house who lived right next door to us. we were probably around 12 and 14 years of age at the time. as we left our house we noticed a large metallic disc hovering above the pecan tree in our front yard about 50 yards from us. when i first saw it i immediately knew that it was a flying saucer. it had the appearance of polished chrome, bright silver. there were no windows or dome on top. it never made a sound. the craft was motionless as it hovered. it was not spinning or wobbley as some video footage of flying saucers show. my brother jumped off his bike and ran to my aunt's house to get my mom who was visiting there. i remember being frightened and amazed at the same time. i got off my bike but did not run.
i stood there watching it for about a minute. then it took off in a northerly direction so fast that it appeared to vanish. by the time i could turn my head to track it, it was just a pinpoint in the distance, at which time i saw it turn and go straight up and out of sight. my mother did not make it outside in time to see it. but she remembers the incident and us telling her about it. i have never forgotten it and never will. since then i have had an insatiable curiosity of the ufo phenomenon and am a true believer that we are not alone and are being visited by extraterrestrial life.
content.summary: My older brother & i observed a disc shaped craft hovering above the pecan tree in our front yard. the craft hovered silently for about a minute then accelerated in a northerly direction at a high rate of speed & then went straight up & out of site.

content.detailedDescription:
A male friend and i were driving back home at 2am. we had gone to pick up a wood stove,  when we noticed strange lights in the sky. we stopped once to look at them then drove on. as we approached lac qui parle dam my phone lit up with a disturbing facial image scaring both of us. then my phone shut off. i felt strange. he suggested we stop on the dam and shake it off. it was a cool morning 40 degrees or so but either of us remembers feeling cold. the water at the dam seemed to be glowing or shimmering. we stood there watching it.We continued on still seeing the lights in the sky. decided to hurry to his house and get telescope out to have a closer look. after leaving the dam two deer stood in the road and wouldn't move. we thought it strange. then 5 miles from his home we were no longer on the same road. he was scared and used the gps on his phone to find where we were. took us about 20 min to realize we were near watson mn north of lac qui parle dam again. almost in the same place we stopped to look at the lights earlier.  i drove fast we were both shaken. as we drove near the dam my phone lit up with the face again. we drove faster joking if we should stop on dam or not. then the deer were in the road again. he was getting scared by the minute so i drove fast not stooping till we were at his home. we looked at the lights thru telescope and binoculars till we got cold. in the house i tried to calm him down by asking him what he remembered happening. then his dog began barking non stop out window where we could still see lights. few moments later the dog began having seizures. the lights disappeared. dog had about 5 seizures. i stayed till sunrise because my friend was so scared. we agreed to meet later that day and go back to see if there was anything that would have caused my phone to act strangely . he wanted to retrace our where we had driven and do it again to try and rationalize what we experienced. we found nothing and on a map there no way to explain how we had gotten way north of the dam.
we also brought the dog to the vet. they found nothing wrong.
i have lingering memories of being taken with my friend and waking up on a metal table being held down by a metal brace. also something by my head which made my body feel like i couldn't move. there was someone by my head and 2-3beings by my lower body. they put a very long metal object into me and i must have lost consciousness. i remember seeing my friend restrained a few feet away from me with beings around him. i'm almost sure my friend was unconscious. i didn't have my menstrual cycle that month.
this wasn't my first experience but is one of the most recent.
content.summary: Driving back w/friend watching a light in the sky. phone lit up w/strange face then shut off. stopped on dam there were strange lights. drove & seen two deer stairing at us. few moments later we were 15-20 miles north of dam. drove back over dam t

content.detailedDescription: I came outside and i always bring my phone so i can use my flashlight app to move any raccoon out of the bushes; for this, i am ecstatic!  the craft was basically in front of me and all i had to do was record it for the world to see.  a believer's dream come true!  there is a lull in the video, one in which i hid in my bushes (because extra smart extraterrestrials could never find me there, hmmm).  the craft had whooshed away (yes, it makes a whoosh sound, it also makes a strange ticking sound) so when it came back behind my head i was shocked.  i understand that the middle of the video is quite boring; however, this is my ufo sighting story.  it's real, it's not filtered, it's not edited and all i want is for everyone to know is there is something else out there.
content.summary: Middle america

content.detailedDescription: After seeing the fireworks in carroll iowa i was going home where i lived at the time.Goinghome i took a right toward the carrol airport. to my left from the east i noticed an object flying very low it had two oblonged lights, right side blue, left side red. it was diffenitely not shaped like a typical aircraft and was flying very low for abot a mile. it passed overhead then vanished.
content.summary: Boomerang craft flew at very low altitude directly above me

content.detailedDescription:
This is probably my 4th ufo sighting. and also the 4th one from the same location.

date: 19-sep-2014
time: 19:22 (india time)
sunset (delhi time): 18:22 (india time)
moonset (delhi time): 15:18 (india time)
weather: unusually very clear sky. lots of stares were visible in the night sky.

i arrived at the park at around 7:00 pm and sat on the bench facing north-east-by-north. the sky was unusually clear and quite dark because there were no clouds and hence no illumination in the sky due to the city lights. 

since i have seen 3 extraterrestrial crafts from this location (park), i habitually kept looking at the sky. as i looked vertically up, i saw a moving star (not a shooting star). it was almost overhead, slightly to my right and was the same size and brightness as any other star visible in the night sky. it looked like and moved at the normal speed at which manmade satellites move across the sky and took about 15 to 30 seconds to traverse the sky from above the center of the park until i could see it no more.

since i have seen 3 extraterrestrial crafts from this very location earlier (58769, 65065, 65067), i feel there are 50% chances that
this too is a ufo and perhaps is my 4th sighting.

my 3rd sighting (65067) was a 100% extraterrestrial craft 11 days ago and that makes me think this too was a ufo. i have been going to this park regularly and i haven't seen any other manmade satellite neither form here nor anywhere else in delhi in that past few years. there are a lot of suspended particles in the delhi air (pollution) which reflect the city lights, which makes seeing manmade satellites in the sky almost impossible.

i repeat, based on very recent previous sightings, there are 50% chances that this is a ufo.
content.summary: It looked like and moved at the normal speed at which manmade satellites move across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On thanksgiving in 1993 my wife ,myself, and my then 10 yr. old daughter were driving east on i90 in willoughby ohio when i noticed a strange very bright flashing light directly ahead coming toward us .I say strange because it was a sunny unclouded day.My wife noticed it also as she was driving. the object came toward us heading due west and intersected with us directly overhead heading straight down i 90 in the opposite direction .We could tell it was moving with great speed as at the same time a small  airplane was traveling beyond it heading north and it seemed to crawl by comparison.As the object grew nearer we could tell it was fluttering and what we perceived as a flshing light was actually sunlight reflecting off the underneath of the craft.It fluttered wildly enough to give us this reflection every couple of seconds. as it passed direcly over us. i would estimate the object to be 3 to 500 ft above us much bigger than a car . again i would estimate 25 to 35 ft in circumference. the object was a silver color ,a circular disk and we are quite sure that it had no wings or any apertures of any kind. it was a solid metallic fluttering disk that reflected sunlight as it passed over us. once i reached our destination i called lost nation airport which is located very close in lake county and asked if there had been any thing unusual on its radar but they said no.I also asked if anyone had reported anything unusual and again they said no.Both my wife and i know what we saw was a ufo and found it quite exciting.I have been looking for a repeat perfomance and whenever i bring the subject up am suprised how many people have had witnessed similar events. i only recently learned about mufon from the hanger one series.
content.summary: Fluttering silver disk no wings reflected sunlight on underside flew direcly over my car as my wife and i drove east

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on my deck to let my dog out. i noticed what i assumed to be the space station in the westward sky. out of the corner of my eye i noticed an object i believed to be an airplane. as i began to focus on it, the object made a very abrupt 45 degre change in direction. within 2 to 3 seconds it made another very abrupt 90 degree turn and began to slow down. it came to a stop and seemed to be a star like object. within a minute or so it began to teeter back and forth. mixed in with this motion it began to make only motions i can only describe as curly ques and sporadically became perfectly still. after several minutes of no movement, i had decided the show was over. another object approached from the east, slowing to a crawl as it passed the 1st object but continued east. i lost sight of the original object in intermittent cloud coverage and was not able to regain sight of it. this lasted for approximately 17 minutes.I true to record the events on my phone but after review the video seems completely black, only the audio is intelligible
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike objects moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Photo # p 809 3384 appeared in photo #2 of 3, round, flat, power field which appears to be magnetic etc. no sound, no lights, no trail. the area is adjacent to the rocky mount grave yard on the rocky mount road in lower caldwell county nc. across from the lovelady wildlife access lot on lake hickory.
content.summary: Round flat like disc with magnetic tail

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of storm clouds and when i opened up the files i saw these. i have no clue what this is. there was nothing visible in the sky other than the clouds i was taking pictures of at the time. can you please email me back with any possible information on what this anomaly could be. thank you
content.summary: Invisible only saw

content.detailedDescription:
Hi. i was checking my photos and found an ufo.

i took multiple photos of the river so i could combine them to make a panorama but only one of them had this weird object in the sky.

Photo # pa 19 5773 taken at the hickory air show on october 19, 2012. in prior photos the oval disc like subject can be seen moving from left to right toward airplane #40 and #44 at a high rate of speed. it appears to be oval, dark center, white outer body and has what appears to be a magnetic like power field.The only sound at the time was hundreds of people enjoying the air show and the airplanes in flight. this unknown flying object has been observed in various other photos over the last two or three years. at various times more than one have been photographed together. they do not appear to be mechanical and move in unison as to be controlled by a central control.
content.summary: In this photo airplane # 40 & 44 are coming in from the right, the subject in moving toward them from the left.

content.detailedDescription: Parked at carroll airport noticed a light similur to a 2nd or third magnitude star travelling and manuvering all over sky in all directions stopping instant stops and direction changes.Watched for abot 30 minutes then left.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Light traveling all over sky and horizon bizzare manuvers

content.detailedDescription: Subject appeared during the hickory air show on october 19, 2012. appears to be about 12 feet in diameter, transparent and has the ability to move about or disappear. the subject appears in the right top of the photo while two airplanes move in from the left. their tail numbers are 40 and 44. other ufo were around the airport as can be seen in photos.Photo number pa 19 5793
content.summary: Round transparent sphere, not viable to the eye, appeared during air show

content.detailedDescription: I was at the java love coffee shop this past saturday morning around 10am. i walked outside and sat in one of the seats. across the street you can see a red rock mountain. the mountain has 2 peaks. i looked up and saw an object that is difficult to describe. it was silver/light gray and angular. it was very large but asymmetrical. it seemed to have a triangular shape but oddly placed angular components to it. the object was partially behind the mountain so i could not see the entire shape, only the top of it. i can best describe it as a sort of triangle with another triangular crosspiece and panels or rectangular shapes attached to it. it appeared solid. the object was spotted between the two peaks, and moved left to right and disappeared behind the second peak. i did not see it initially fly behind the mountain, or exit on the other side. it just appeared in the center of the two peaks, and moved behind the second peak where it was no longer visible. the sighting lasted a matter of seconds but i saw it dead on, on a clear sunny day.
content.summary: Saw silver/gray angular object move behind a mountain between 2 peaks.

content.detailedDescription: Upon my return from new mexico i was driving on h-287 towards ft. worth when i saw this bright object ... round with a black wing(?) protruding from the craft. i couldn't make out if it was a wing or just part of the object. it was between the clouds, got brighter as if ready to leave the planet and off it went and disappeared. lasted about 5 seconds if that. i could not track it nor did i see it again.
content.summary: A small craft with a weird wing

content.detailedDescription:
Short description:
in the early afternoon i was walking in the forest, when i noticed this unknown creature on the road. a bright sphere floated in front of him. i took out my mobile phone, and i did a photograph. thereafter i do not remember what happened, only that the creature disappeared. what was that? alien?
content.summary: Unknown creature in the forest with photo - budapest, hungary

content.detailedDescription:
This happened approximately in october 1999. we had moved to a new house and i was sorting out some old items left by the previous tenant in an old glass lean-to greenhouse on the back garden.
it was around eight o’clock at night. my daughter came out to see what i was doing. i looked up to talk to her when i notice a bright light, which was like a motorcycle headlight glowing in the trees some 500 yards away to the east of my property.
i didn’t take much notice at that time but when i looked again a short time later i noticed it had risen higher, so i stood up and watched it rise even higher, the trees in question were approximately 60 – 70 feet in height at the time so i would say the light was around 20 feet of the ground.
my first instincts was a motorcycle on a street further down the main road as this area is built on raised ground, but the roads run in the opposite direction so the light would be aimed in the opposite direction, and then the craft rose above the height of the trees, and hovered for some time. 10-20 seconds or more.
my daughter was becoming a little agitated due to the light had started to slowly move towards us.
as it got closer we both could see that it was a dark craft of triangular shape and it had different coloured lights around the edges. i can’t remember now, it being so long ago, but i believe the bright light was no longer aluminate on the craft.
it stopped almost directly above us and i would say at a height of around 600ft, the craft covered a large area above the house.
there was no noise, no down draft, nothing, the craft just sat there.
i had been taking some before and after photos of the property, so my camera was at hand on the kitchen worktop. i rushed in grabbed the camera and ran back outside.
i looked up at the craft, which was still in the same place, and then it started to move forward i pointed and aimed the camera without looking through the viewfinder and pressed the shutter.
 it was like the craft was synchronized with the camera, as i was about to pressed the shutter the craft turned on its axis and shot off at an unbelievable speed, (let’s say at the blink of an eye) in a northerly direction 
when the film came back from the printers all that was on the film was the chimney stack
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light changed to triangle shaped then vanished at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing a bright ball of light in the sky in the exact same position every night for at least a couple of weeks.  i have pictures but am unable to attach, they are on my phone.  it is much brighter than my pictures show, it appears to have rays like a star but looks like just an orb of light in the pictures.  last night, it was there same as always. no other stars in the clear sky.  no sound.  after i fell asleep, i woke up to the sound of a helicopter going overhead.  unsure of exact time, i think around 11:00 or so.  the dog wanted out so i let him out, looked up at the sky and the light was gone and there were numerous stars. this light or object is gone during the day. ive been watching it for a couple of weeks, unsure how long its been there unnoticed. it may be nothing but cannot figure out what it is or why it was gone after the helicopter went through but any other night it is there all night (as far as i know) or why the light doesn't move or pulse or blink or why there are no other stars in an otherwise clear sky but after the helicopter went by, the stars were there and the light was gone. everytime i sleep over the last couple of nights, i have "dreams" where i am gasping for breath but i don't wake up, sometimes this feeling of not being able to breathe is also when i am awake but drifting to sleep so i am aware its happening.  my dog was sick and vomited last night right around the time the helicopter came through, he is never sick like that. just seems like a lot of strange events since i started taking pictures of this light. i'm not a ufo person so i know nothing of all of this information, if its related or is nothing.  i am a paranormal investigator, ghosts not ufos, so i'm clueless if i'm seeing something or not. as i said, i have pictures on my cell phone but no way to attach them to this report.
content.summary: Bright sphere of light, unmoving, same position nightly, no other stars.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today: 

i have been seeing a disc-shaped object over kansas city, mo for the past several nights. i am in gladstone, north of kansas city, and saw the object directly south, and southwest from my front porch and street. it looked like it was first over kc, mo then over ks. i first saw the object it on april 30 when my wife pointed it out to me- it is brightly lit, with red, green, blue, and purplish lights spinning horizontally and clockwise on the exterior of the object. it first appears a hovering. last night the same object hovered for 20 minutes, then moved very slowly behind a tree line. it took 5 minutes for it to move out of sight. i was able to get a short video of it with my cell phone on april 30, which is the first night i saw it. on one night i saw two of the objects, but i went inside to check on the children and when i returned they were gone.
my wife is an administrator for a group home and we live in an apartment attached to the building. when people change shifts, i have pointed the object out to them, and they also thought it was very strange. at least 10 people have seen it as of today. i am ex-military and have studied aircraft for over 20 years and this is not a plane or any object known to me. it is also not a planet or star. i told my sister about it and she started watching the skies from her house in overland park, kansas and she took over 100 photos of unknown objects in the past few days (she will file a separate report). i just want to know if anyone else is seeing this and if anyone knows what it is.
content.summary: Disk-shaped object with multiple flashing lights hovering over kansas city for the past 6 days - not a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at around 9pm going north. the road i was driving on has sand dunes on either side, hardly any street lights, and a housing complex towards the of road. driving, i was the only one on the road. i noticed some flashing lights in the distance, but thought at the time that it was just lightening or something. i continue driving north. while i was driving, i felt a force move my mini van into the other lane, going against traffic. i slam on the breaks because i was unsure whether i had hit something or had a tire blow out, etc. however, once i slam on the breaks, this blue, almost sparkly, light appears in my car and all around it. the light seems to have movement and is so vibrant that it looked like nothing i had seen here on earth. i'm freaking out and then all of a sudden the light is gone. completely gone, in less than a second. so i hit the gas and try to run away from whatever the heck that was. at the end of the road, there is a stoplight in which you have to turn left or right at. the stoplight was red so i, needing to turn left, was stopped in the left lane. as i am stopped, my car is thrust into the other lane and the blue sparkly light appears again all in the car and around it. too afraid, i drove away without waiting for the light to disappear again. but once i hit the gas, the light disappeared as quickly as it came. i then drove home and told my parents what i had seen. i never was able to see the source of the light, but i felt as if i was in some sort of field or beam. i felt like i was being watched as the light seemed very invasive. the light i had seen had movement, almost as if it was flowing. i wish i had more information but that is all i witnessed.
content.summary: Force hit car, blur lights appeared all inside/around the car, disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Every night for approx four months, large hovering light expels 3 smaller lights and they seem to be in some formation.
when i followed the larger one it disappeared only to reappear at the same location outside my home.
object hovers for several hours with different light patterns then becomes invisible.
this has been witnessed by several other guests.
i have tried researching govt projects in this area and have found nothing, also  this is a very rural country setting.
i am sorry that i do not have a camera good enough to get a picture.
content.summary: Happens every night four four months

content.detailedDescription: On my balcony and took a picture of the moon because it was bright and somewhat pretty with a halo around it. noticed a big star in the photo by the moon. seemed too big to be a planet or star. i could only see it with my iphone. may be saturn or the mothership. regardless, never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Took pic of moon and this was by the moon but couldn't see with naked eye, just iphone.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend sudheer and i were on terrace of my house to have a clear view of lunar eclipse on april 4,2015. the moon was on east. i turned towards west and saw a cloud type thing moving slowly and hovering over a building for about two minutes. i called my friend and he was too amazed at that moment. then it slowly headed towards south direction from north.
i called my mother( already reported in mufon about a ufo). we all thought it was cloud, but were totally wrong when it came closer.
we can clearly see that it was a huge object(larger than football stadium) slightly transparent and covered with a sort of mist.
it moved very slowly. i took out my phone to take pics but in vain. my phone was switched off mysteriously. my friend face turned grey as he was very much afraid and my mother was surprised. before disappearing we saw a series of orange blue sort of lights coming from its windows. after its disappearance we felt a sort of religious feeling, don't know why.
i thought to report at that moment but i didn't got much time because of my exams. hence, i reported this incident so late.
it is not the first time i saw ufo. when i was taking random photos(last deepawali festival), i got a catch of an orb sort of thing on my photo.
i hope mufon will succeed in proving the existence of aliens.
content.summary: Ufo at hyderabad

content.detailedDescription: My 9 year old grandson was outside practicing baseball when he witnessed a v shaped craft flying overhead. he watched it for a couple of minutes then ran in to tell me. when we went to look it was gone. he said it was v shaped and one side was red and the other was gray. i looked up pictures on the web and the ones we saw were close but wrong color and he said the one he saw was more acute (his words not mine) he's extremely advanced forhis age and would never make anything up like this. he was extremely frightened and required me to lay with him to go to sleep that night. the next morning i questioned him again and he told me he didn't want to talk about it anymore he just wanted to forget it ever happened. not sure what to make of this.
content.summary: 9 year old grandson observed a v shaped craft while outside. he watched it for approx 1-2 minutes then ran inside to tell me. he was very frightened!  we ran outside but it was gone. he said it was going very slow in a straight line and one side was red t

content.detailedDescription: On may 4, 2015, around 9:15pm, n****** and i were waking back to our apartment from the laundry room, we noticed a very large light that appeared to be heading in our direction.  at first we speculated that it was a low-flying plane's headlight facing directly at us, for it was so bright and there were no green or red flashing lights.  however, as it got closer and eventually crossed the sky, we noticed that it had three large circular lights on the bottom of the aircraft.  we could not see the outline of the aircraft clearly, so we are not sure if it was round or triangular.  however, the three round lights formed a triangle, with the front one pointing in the direction it was going; it looked very sleek, as if could have been round.  come to think of it, it must have been some sort of matte black, because it was heading in the direction of the moon, but it hardly reflected any light, allowing it to blend in with the dark sky.  if i were to take a stance, i would take the stand that it appeared more to be in the shape of a saucer than a triangle.  this is because as the three lights passed by us in the sky, for a moment only two of the lights were visible, as if it had a belly at the bottom of it that briefly blocked out the far light.  it was really hard to see its shape, however, so it could have been in the shape of a triangle.  i am not sure how low it was, but from where we were standing, it was right at/above the tree line as it passed us from the north sky heading in the southeast direction.  there were multiple clearings that allowed for a completely unobstructed view as it passed us, and we are 100% sure about there being three lights at the bottom of it.  also, it should most definitely be noted that the aircraft made absolutely no noise, whatsoever.  n****** was with me the entire time, and can confirm what we saw.
content.summary: 3 very large and bright dome lights under low-flying, silent aircraft.  there were no green or red blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: My kids and i were driving home from my parents house. we were driving on burnt store rd heading to cape coral when out of nowhere lights suddenly appeared over very low trees,we saw 4 white lights and one pulsing red light gliding low and slow. we thought it was a plane until it curved slowly towards our direction then we saw the lights in a triangle formation and what looked like a black mass between them. i pulled over to the curb and rolled down my window...My daughter and i were shocked with disbelief because there was no sound from such a low flying object. my daughter kept saying "i don't think that's a plane", and i definitely knew it was not a plane or stealth bomber. i started to drive away from the curb and we looked back up it was gone. the trees are very low in that area...There is no way it could have disappeared in the seconds it took me to put the car in drive.
content.summary: 4 light with a red pulsing light thought it plane, slight turn revealed triangle shape with more lights, too low, no sound, going 30-40 mph

content.detailedDescription:
Photo taken by a remington model 533 wildlife camera. camera was positioned on sidewalk, motion sensitive. it was in november of 2009 and overcast. on the left side one can see a metallic ufo with what appears to be legs, a sign extends down from one. an operator appears to be coming out the top. the size of the unit is estimated to be approximately 
24 inches in diameter. several bright lights can be seen close to the sidewalk, these are not connected to the unit. the photo id # is dsc 2641
content.summary: Photo by wildlife camera, subject appears to be small chrome ufo with operator.

content.detailedDescription: Parked at carroll airport noticed above me unusual triangle shaped cloud with what appeared to be a horizontal stabulizer travelling below a still cloud cover, it would appear for a few seconds then dissapear on same trejectory and speed.
content.summary: Triangle craft horizontal stabulizer

content.detailedDescription: A ufo took off from behind the jcp home store it was a circle it had lights and hovered it flew for a distance the lights oilseed in the photos i took the objects did not appear.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Took off and hovered away
